attributes.action: relate care costs for the elderly on a par with inheritance tax allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Care for the elderly is essentially a cost associated with dying. Similarly so are death duty taxes. Possibly assets that should be reserved not to be accounted for in a means test for care should be the equal of the threshold for inheritance tax?
Not having those points tied together might even affect suicide rates.
